question: How can I apply minimalism to my digital life?

steps.content: How can I apply minimalism to my digital life?
Plan: 1) Search for strategies to apply minimalism to digital life. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for strategies to apply minimalism to digital life.
Found articles on digital minimalism, including decluttering files, reducing app usage, and managing screen time.
Plan: 1) Summarize key strategies from search results. 2) Return the answer.
Key strategies include decluttering digital files, unsubscribing from unnecessary emails, using minimalist apps, and setting boundaries for screen time.
To apply minimalism to your digital life, consider decluttering your digital files, unsubscribing from unnecessary emails, using minimalist apps, and setting boundaries for screen time.

true_answer: To apply minimalism to your digital life, consider decluttering your digital files, unsubscribing from unnecessary emails, using minimalist apps, and setting boundaries for screen time.
